ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( ISPICKVAL(Set_Up_Status__c,"Mapping Complete") , OR(ISPICKVAL( Preferences__c ,""), ISPICKVAL( EFT_Split__c ,""), ISPICKVAL( Exporting_Reporting_Utilized__c ,"")) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Preferences , ETF Split ? and Exporting Reporting Utilized needs to be populated.
